name: Breakfast Time in Dream Land
description:
It is 4:00am. Your cats have entered your dreamland, demanding you wake up to feed them. With toys and catnip bombs, defeat their meows and feline magic and sleep in as long as you can!

Controls:
  • Keyboard:
    • WASD / Arrows: movement
    • Shift: fire toy
    • Space: fire catnip bomb
  • Gamepad:
    • Left stick: movement
    • A: fire toy
    • B: fire catnip bomb
